data.eml:eml: Linderiella jebalae sp. nov. (Crustacea: Branchiopoda: Anostraca), a new species from the Rif mountains (northern Morocco)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Boix, Dani, Sala, Jordi, Escoriza, Daniel, Alonso, Miguel (2016): Linderiella jebalae sp. nov. (Crustacea: Branchiopoda: Anostraca), a new species from the Rif mountains (northern Morocco). Zootaxa 4138 (3): 491-512, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4138.3.4
